text: ad (samuhaya)ta pasu numbala va ohu niyojitayin bavata pat kota mahapolove vasaya kirimata sælæs vu avasthava numbala menehi karanu. numbala ehi amudravya tulin maligavan tana gannehuya. tavada kandu hara nivasa tana gannehuya. ebævin allahge dayadayan numbala menehi karanu. tavada mahapolove kalahakam karannan lesin papakari ayurin katayutu nokaranu
